author: mike_konopek
content:
Hi guys, first of all very excited to be here, great idea with permissonless access!
In my free time I'm working on library for state proofs - https://github.com/koonopek/eth-merkle-proofs and I would like to develop here in this direction ðŸ™‚
Here is great talk about it - https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=ZHNrAXf3RDE&ab_channel=EthereumFoundation by Etan Kissling.

author: ameya
content: what are the best resources for deeply understanding the execution and consensus layers in the post-merge world? would love some recommendations

author: echo_alice
content:
My favorite resource for consensus layer (book app):
https://eth2book.info/altair/
Tons of details woven together nicely.  Heads up though, it's still a WIP

My favorite resource for execution layer (video):
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kCswGz9naZg
This is really good for getting an overview of the entire system. Not as much depth
